column5: After watching the weather all week we decided to head out Saturday for some pike action in the inner bay. Nicole, my daughter Taylor and I had a great day out on the lake. We caught over 20 pike, some were big, some were not so big.  Here are a few pictures.  Taylor with her first fish of the season, she is quickly learning how to outfish her dad, once she get's better out casting watch out!!!     Me with the First REAL fish in the new boat lol    Nicole's first real fish of 08, she actually tried to hold this herself, but it was going to bite her so she dropped it and ran... well, not really, but I guess I could photoshop her in later...    It was a great day out there, many more to come this season!
Thanks for the report. I like first picture.
good way to spend a day,congrats
Looks like the women in your life don't like to touch fish  lol  .... but at least they are out there with ya....great day for all of you, thanks for sharing
I had a pike twist and bite me, opened up my thumb nicely.  I got the last licks in tho, with a Parry Sound Severe and some light breading.  Nice pictures of a beauty day.
Good stuff Wendel ! Glad the new boat's getting the whole family involved.
Good shooting. Always nice to get the younsters out there.
I was going to head out there today but my buddy never called me back  Oh well, will be out next saturday, sunday and monday gettin the new boat covered with slime!
We are taking the boat down again tomorrow, supposed to be a beautiful day, hopefully we get more pics
Yes maybe even some with me actually holding my fish!!! LOL
